page.title: 03Description of ref. 03690071
page.content: This area contains the settlement known as Easton. This is the main commercial area of the southern part of the Island as it has most of the shops, banks, Building Societies and other businesses used by the local population. These commercial interests are located around Easton Square which also contains gardens and a playground for young children. Buildings of note in this area include the old St. George's school (now used as a craft centre), the Health Centre serving a large part of he Island, Portland Museum which contains exhibits and paintings of local history and two old windmills located in quarry land in the southern part of the grid square.
